About
Get to know Chapman

events.chapman.edu

Academic Programs






RESEARCH
Industry Alliances and Commercialization






PURPOSE
Support Chapman












Hire Chapman's Class of 2022
Recruit a Graduate


If you or your company are looking for top-notch talent to fill roles within your organization, look no further than Chapman’s network of outstanding alumni and students. Think Chapman First and hire Chapman talent to join your team!



Get StartedÂ 













BECOME A PARTNER
Engage Purposefully

An industry partnership with Chapman University is more than just a business arrangement. It’s an opportunity to create many mutually beneficial successes through a variety of connections and opportunities.
When you partner with Chapman, you not only gain a strong pipeline of qualified and professional applicants, you become engrained in the Chapman Family, which connects you with opportunities for professional development, philanthropy, networking and more. 


Connect with usÂ 













RECRUIT
Top Employers

Meet Chapman's Top Employers, our 'Think Chapman First' Champions. 


View Top EmployersÂ 


                                Explore
                                


Read 2022 Announcement
Recruit Chapman Talent
Find Alumni at Your Organization
















Engage
Strengthen your organization’s relationship with our growing Chapman Family of administrators, board members, faculty, staff, and students, plus more than 50,000 alumni across the globe. Opportunities include guest speaking and lecturing, networking events, mentorship programs and more.
Engage







Recruit
Think Chapman First and hire exceptional Chapman talent when building your organization’s team. Receive professional concierge assistance when recruiting Chapman students for internships and seasoned alumni professionals.
Recruit







Research
Tap into groundbreaking research and collaborate with Chapman’s pioneering experts and students across a range of disciplines to pursue solutions to the challenges facing your industry.
Research







Purpose
Philanthropy is a powerful and impactful way to connect your organization with the incredible things happening every day at Chapman University. Companies play an integral role in scholarship funding through sponsorships, capital campaign projects and more.
Purpose







Learn
Connect your team with invaluable professional development opportunities at the University, including executive education programs tailored to your organization’s unique needs.
Learn

Experienced Students and Alumni

participate in
Experiential Learning

Class of 2020 First Destination Survey

have an 
Internship

employers

100k+
Real-World Experience
Hours



Every year, Chapman students gain more than 100,000 hours of real-world experience via academic internships alone
Internship Academic Credit Registration















AAA
"INNOVATIVE INSIGHTS"

"Establishing a partnership with Chapman University has been very beneficial and has helped to bring additional innovative insights into our organization."
— Galen Grillo (EMBA '13)  (Vice President, Automobile Club of Southern California ; Fmr. and Founding Chair, Chapman University Industry Partners Council ; Chapman University Board of Governors)


Celebrating our partnership with AAA













BANK OF AMERICA
"EXCEED OUR EXPECTATIONS"

"Our relationship with Chapman reflects the true, deep, meaning of ‘partnership.’ We can always count on Chapman to exceed our expectations and help us wow our clients."
— Shari Battle (Senior Vice President, Market Manager of Orange County, Bank of America ; Chair, Chapman University Industry Partners Council ; Chapman University Board of Governors)


Read: Shari Battle Named Chair of Chapman Universityâs Industry Partners Council
